4. transformer module¶

class transformer.Decoder(vocab_size, hopping_num, head_num, hidden_dim, dropout_rate, max_length, *args, **kwargs)¶

ベースクラス: tensorflow.python.keras.engine.training.Model

エンコードされたベクトル列からトークン列を生成するDecoder

call(input, encoder_output, self_attention_mask, enc_dec_attention_mask, training)¶

モデルを実行

パラメータ

  • input (tf.Tensor) -- shape = [batch_size, length]

  • training (bool) -- 学習時はTrue

戻り値

shape = [batch_sizem length, hidden_dim]

戻り値の型

(tf.Tensor)

class transformer.Transformer(vocab_size, hopping_num=4, head_num=8, hidden_dim=512, dropout_rate=0.1, max_length=50, *args, **kwargs)¶

ベースクラス: tensorflow.python.keras.engine.training.Model

Transforme model

build_graph(name='transformer')¶

学習/推論のためのグラフを構築

call(encoder_input, decoder_input, training)¶

Calls the model on new inputs.

In this case call just reapplies all ops in the graph to the new inputs (e.g. build a new computational graph from the provided inputs).

パラメータ

  • inputs -- A tensor or list of tensors.

  • training -- Boolean or boolean scalar tensor, indicating whether to run the Network in training mode or inference mode.

  • mask -- A mask or list of masks. A mask can be either a tensor or None (no mask).

戻り値

A tensor if there is a single output, or a list of tensors if there are more than one outputs.
